testsuite.test:
Precondition
Instructions: Please measure the width of your device with a ruler and enter the value. Press Done when you're ready.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Touch media query
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did it say YES?

device aspect ratio media query
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

dpi media query
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the value part of the range?
